creditline: Gift of funds from Nancy and Rolf Engh in celebration of the 100th anniversary of the Minneapolis Institute of Arts
description: 20 separate images/panels; view of a workspace in a repair shop for stringed instruments, crammed with tools, materials and stringed musical instruments; unglazed; mounted in five units of four vertical images (a,f,k,p - b,g,l,q - c,h,m,r - d,i,n,s - e,j,o,t); letters assigned from left to right in rows
dimension:
127 5/16 × 159 1/2 in. (323.43 × 405.13 cm) (overall, approx.)
32 × 31 3/4 in. (81.28 × 80.65 cm) (object part, panel, each, approx.)
29 × 29 in. (73.66 × 73.66 cm) (object part, image, each, approx.)
title: Dahl Violin Shop
